constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Key Area of Change
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Details required by Condition 13 (Site Management) for planning permission 18/10299/FUL  (Demolition of existing buildings and erection of 9 x 3 bed houses with associated parking, landscape and amenity space)
decision_conditions: The details submitted for the Condition 13 (Site Management) of planning permission  18/10299/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and this condition is hereby fully discharged.

You have been granted planning permission to build a residential extension.  When undertaking demolition and/or building work, please be considerate to your neighbours and do not undertake work before 8am or after 6pm Monday to Friday, before 8am or after 1pm on a Saturday or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.  Furthermore, please ensure that all vehicles associated with the construction of the development hereby approved are properly washed and cleaned to prevent the passage of mud and dirt onto the adjoining highway. You are advised that the Council does have formal powers to control noise and nuisance under The Control of Pollution Act 1974, the Clean Air Acts and other relevant legislation.  For further information and advice, please contact - Environmental Health Department Pollution Section.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Minor works without adverse impact upon tree health or amenity. Most works also being exempt.Recommendation:No objections.
